response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will exceed your expectations. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my commitment to ensuring that such an extraordinary product finds its way into the hands of someone who appreciates its true worth. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
